question: How many solar cities have been developed under Development of Solar Cities scheme?
explanation: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) under its "Development of Solar Cities" scheme sanctioned the development of 60 Solar Cities including 13 Pilot and 5 Model Cities up to 12th Five-year Plan period (2012-2017). So far, master plans of 49 Solar Cities have been prepared. Under it, local Governments are motivated for adopting renewable energy technologies and energy efficiency measures. Solar City developed under this scheme will have all types of renewable energy based projects like solar, wind, biomass, small hydro, waste to energy.
